divs: sighting detailsme and my son-inlaw were cruising down i85 and stopped at the first rest stop south of roanoke va.walking back to the car,we saw this perfect ball in the sky,maybe a half mile away and maybe 200 feet above the ground.to the south of us there had been a storm,partly cloudy ,very dark clouds but they were breaking up.this thing was very stationary ,well no real wind blowing but being a two way radio repair tech i know that the wind can be still on the ground and at 100 feet its usually some are stirring. it seemed like a ballon buy ,no string\rope and so perfectly round.it was not black but reminded me of the the ash tray i made in high school art class the glaze was dark bronze and this this was very glossy glaze looking. we didnt look at it long but the funny thing the next day it bothered me that ,what porpose was it,i ballon usually advertise and why dark and shiny and so mettallic \shiny. seemed that it was not a solid color maybe bacause it was so reflective.one better explanation is if you dark grey,dark brown and some silver and glazed it to a mirror finish on the other hand it may not be an et device,wonder if anyone else has seen the same thing.
Summary: Perfect ball maybe10 to 20 ft in diam., dark, could see the sun's reflection.
